channel.title: Ptg on Technology is Fun Because It's Always Changing
channel.description: Recent content in Ptg on Technology is Fun Because It's Always Changing

item.title: Dublin PTG 2018: The Edge Sessions
item.description: I recently got snowed in at a hotel in Dublin with a couple hundred people I consider friends, a well-stocked bar/restaurant, a fantastic event staff, and a lot of energy. I know…poor me, right? =) Before Storm Emma and the Beast from the East settled in on the OpenStack Project Team Gathering and forced the Croke Park Stadium to close (thereby giving birth to the hashtag “snowpenstack”), we got a solid start to the week.
